Text: Uwe̩ ki du o̩kokuno̩ abe̩k e̩wño̩re̩ egini kʼi chʼe̩no̩lo̩, abe̩k e-kʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ du dʼo̩la-wñ kpa ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ n; todu e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ oñ e-le̩ che ñwu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩.
Iche̩wñ ku ma fʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ kʼi ache e̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa li ef ume̩ ef aku aku-we̩ du e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩, kʼi fʼalo-wñ daba,
kʼi la nyʼare̩ amo̩jo̩ omune̩, kʼi dojikane̩ ñwu ma, abe̩k olu abe̩k ochu abe̩k e̩wñ ki jo̩ ojale wewe-i, e-kʼomi ma ñwa ñwu ma ku ma che n,
kʼe̩ne̩ʼka mudu ka ñw e̩, kʼuwe̩ la gbʼinabali-wñ; e̩gbale̩ uwe̩ ki tejane̩ o̩bie̩ o̩bie̩, e̩ la go, iche̩wñ ki chʼochochi, ku ma la ma o̩pio̩o̩ ka ku ma fʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ abe̩le̩ che Israe̩l,
mak uwe̩ ki dʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ kʼi fʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩-i che dufu wa alaku-we̩, tak uwe̩ ki dʼokuta ro̩ dʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ le̩ kʼi ku.
Alu ame̩nibenu meji abe̩k e̩ta achʼoka, taku ma dʼe̩ne̩ kʼi aku kpa; ama ki gbo̩ alu e̩nibenu okate ku ma dʼone̩ kpa n.
O̩wo̩ ame̩nibenu le̩ akadʼo ejodudu tak o̩wo̩ amone̩ du akadʼo ku ma dʼu kpa. Abe̩le̩ uwe̩ ki kʼe̩bie̩ne̩ rinyo̩ bʼef uwe̩ te̩.

Iche̩wñ kʼo̩laʼka chi kʼoji ajo̩-wñ firu we̩ eka, dagba i chʼo̩la one̩ e̩kpa, dagba i chʼo̩la agbagba one̩ meji, dagba i chʼugbo e̩wñ e̩chʼomune̩, owñ chʼo̩la du ki chi ewo ewo-we̩ kʼi gbiti tʼuwe̩ le, e̩gbale̩ uwe̩ ki kwane̩, kʼe̩ mute̩gu nyʼuña e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu,
oñ abu kʼuwe̩ lewugbo amatama ku ma chʼabo Lifai, kpai ugbo akajo̩ kʼi ado̩mo̩ iko le̩, tak uwe̩ ki tene; tak ama afʼoji ajo̩-we̩ kpa ñw e̩.
Tak uwe̩ ki che teju alu ku ma kpʼoji o̩la le̩ ugbo uña e-ki Jihofa adu le̩; uwe̩ ki fejutʼo̩ kʼe̩ che tʼeju o̩la du ku ma kʼe̩;
likpa alu ku ma ako̩ uwe̩ kpai tʼeju oji ajo̩ ku ma du te̩ ñw e̩, alu le̩ uwe̩ ache; e̩ ki rida bʼoji ajo̩ ku ma ka ñw e̩ te̩ n, e̩ ki na tʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi n.

Oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi ajibenu, kʼi ma la nyʼatama kʼi dago ache e̩wñ o̩gba Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ o̩mo̩ eti n, abe̩k i ma la gbʼe-kʼakajo̩ ka n, eku e̩ne̩ le̩ aku; abe̩le̩ oñ uwe̩ la akʼe̩bie̩ne̩ rinyo̩ bʼ Israe̩l te̩.
Tak amone̩-i du agbo̩, oñ ma arailo, taku ma ma ñʼajibenu abe̩le̩ ge̩ n.
E̩gba kʼuwe̩ lewa ane̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ kʼe̩ la ne̩, kʼe̩ dodo o̩mo̩, kʼuwe̩ akakini, Nadʼonu gugu kʼi ne̩ mi, dab abo uche̩ichi chaka ku ma lʼumi daka-i;
e̩ne̩ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ achi, owñ le̩ kate oñ uwe̩ adu jʼonu-we̩. E̩ne̩ʼka ef amo̩maye-we̩ oñ uwe adu jʼonu-we̩; i nʼugbo du kʼuwe̩ adʼononojo kʼi ma chʼo̩maye-we̩ n jʼonu-we̩ n.
Amanya-wñ ki muda wewe nyo̩gba n, i ki je̩ ñw amone̩ dabi nyʼIjipti ku ma tene amanya wewe ñw u n, todabu ki Jihofa ka ñwu me̩ kakini, Ame̩ ki ño̩ dabi lʼo̩na o̩mo̩ ge̩ n.
Amo̩ya-wñ ki la wewe nyo̩gba n, kʼe̩do̩-wñ ki we erida tʼubi; i ki la ne̩ ajifa kpai o̩jamalia nyo̩gba ololo ololo n.
Oñ e̩gba kʼi kwogugu oj ede o̩fe̩-wñ, owñ ki nada uko̩-o̩la-i nyʼef o̩takada omune̩ ñw o̩la-wñ, i ki ko̩ teju e-kʼi dʼo̩gba amatama ku ma chʼabo Lifai le̩;
e-le̩ la ade̩ ugbo-wñ, i la achʼo̩kalatu-wñ o̩jo̩ du kʼudeju-wñ kade, todu kʼi ko̩che̩ ailo Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ era, kʼi fʼuko̩-o̩la-i du kpai uhio̩me̩-wñ de, kʼi che tʼeju-wñ;
kʼi we ehio̩la-wñ ne tʼamo̩maye-wñ le, kʼi la we ena bʼuko̩ le̩ te̩, tʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ tʼo̩wo̩ awohi; todu kʼi kpojolugbo ef o̩fe̩-wñ, owñ kpai amo̩ma-wñ, alumeji Israe̩l.
